it.name: Sparky's Potion
it.desc: Sparky's Potion enables the Dino that drinks it *to take another turn* without having to wait until the next day.
it.effect: ::name:: can jump again and do another action! Thanks Sparky!

it.name: Angel Potion
it.desc: The Angel Potion enables you *to resurrect a dead Dino*. Furthermore, this potion *cancels all negative effects* (virus, poison, etc.). If you have 0 life points, your Dino can't do anything and needs to be resurrected.
it.effect: ::name:: is coming round! He is slowly opening his eyes and he thanks you for having saved him.

it.name: Cloudburger
it.desc: The Cloudburger enables you *to improve a Dino's health (+10% life)*. It's particularly useful after a fight, and is much appreciated by hungry Dinos.
it.effect: ::name:: has recovered ::p::% of life after a short and well deserved break. He's happy that you are looking after him!

it.name: Oven Fresh Bread
it.desc: The Oven Fresh Bread enables your Dino *to get back all his life points*! Its unique properties and its wonderful taste make the Bread one of the best foods in Dinoland.
it.effect: ::name:: has got back all his life points! Jump for joy!

it.name: Blackberry Drink
it.desc: Blackberry Drink brought directly from Saint Blackberrytown. Strictly controlled production, and of certified quality. A true delight!
it.effect: Blackberry Drink is delicious! But only if you like blackberries... The effect it has on your Dino enables him to win ::p2::% of Life and a ::p::% of experience.

it.name: Shepherd's Pie
it.desc: Shepherd's Pie is always a surprise! It enables your Dino *to recover between 10 and 20% of life* (chosen at random).
it.effect: ::name:: has just taken a bite of his Shepherd's Pie. He recovered by ::p::% !

it.name: Chocolate Medal
it.desc: This sweet gives *an experience bonus to your Dino (+10%)*. Any amount can be eaten whenever he wants!
it.effect: ::name:: has devoured his chocolate medal and he feels much stronger. He gains a ::p::% of experience!

it.name: Incandescent Spell
it.desc: The Incandescent Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage caused by the next *Fire* element attack that he suffers.
it.effect: ::name:: is now protected from the next *Fire* attack that he receives.

it.name: Titan Spell
it.desc: The Titan Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage caused by the next *Earth* element attack that he receives.
it.effect: ::name:: is now protected from the next *Earth* attack that he receives.

it.name: Volvik Spell
it.desc: The Volvik Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage caused by the next *Water* attack that he receives.
it.effect: ::name:: is now protected from the next *Water* attack that he receives.

it.name: 220W Spell
it.desc: The 220W Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage caused by the next *Thunder* attack that he receives.
it.effect: ::name:: is now protected from the next *Thunder* attack that he receives.

it.name: Wind Spell
it.desc: The Wind Spell enables your Dino to nullify the damage caused by the next *Wind* attack that he receives.
it.effect: ::name:: is now protected from the next *Wind* attack that he receives.

it.name: Poisoned Claws
it.desc: These enable you *to poison your next opponent*, regardless of who starts the fight -either he or you!
it.effect: Your Dino has turned into a wild beast! The next Dino who dares to challenge yours will be *poisoned*.

it.name: Wolf Cub's Spit
it.desc: Wolf Cub's Spit enables you *to cure your poisoned Dino*. The side effects will be the envy of the battlefield!
it.effect: Your Dino is now *cured of the poison*! He's really keen to get back into the fight!

it.name: Ramen's Secrecy Bowl
it.desc: The unique recipe of these exotic noodles enables the Dino which eat them to become almost invisible *(dividing the Danger by half 2)* and consequently having less possibility of being attacked!
it.effect: Your Dino has lost *half of his Danger*! Now it's easier to avoid being attacked!

it.name: Cherry Liqueur
it.desc: This thick and sweet juice has extraordinary effects. Not only does it *reduce your Danger Level to 0* but it will also seriously *weaken* the increase of the Danger in each fight.
it.effect: *Wooaaah.* For some time now, your Dino has been feeling stressed because of his Danger Level. Now he feels much better and thanks you by jumping for joy!

it.name: Tiger's Eye
it.desc: Thanks to the Tiger's Eye, your Dino can find his enemies wherever they are! The possibilities of *escaping* are lowered and allow you to pursue the *enemies of your Clan* in a Tournament. This has a *permanent* effect.
it.effect: One of ::name::'s eyes has changed colour... now you can find your next victims no matter how well they hide!

it.name: The Power of Nature
it.desc: Once this power is used on one of your Dino, he will obtain *+2 in Earth* and *+2 in Air*. This effect can be effective during many combats.
it.effect: ::name:: has gained +2 in Earth and +2 in Air! This effect will last until the Power disappears.

it.name: Agressivity Power
it.desc: Once this power is used on one of your Dino, he will obtain *+2 in Fire* and *+2 in Lightening*. This effect can be effective during many combats.
it.effect: ::name:: has obtained +2 in Fire and +2 en Lightening! This effect will last until the Power disappears.

it.name: The Power of Sirain
it.desc: Once this power is used on one of your Dino, he will obtain *+5 in Water*. This effect can be effective during many combats.
it.effect: ::name:: has obtained +5 in Water! This effect will last until the Power disappears.

it.name: Chikabum Antidote
it.desc: This antidote allows you to cure one of your Dinos of the Chikabum Virus. It will also make him *immune to the next virus that infects him* (only once).
it.effect: ::name:: has been cured of the Chikabum Virus!

it.name: Market bond
it.desc: Certified by the Dinoland Bank, it's worth *1000 coins*. You can use it or exchange it.
it.effect: You have used a Market Bond, you get 1000 coins!

it.name: Shadow Potion
it.desc: The Shadow Potion is a gift offered by the Demons of Dinoland to thank you for your sacrifices. Will you be brave enough to use it?
it.effect: Your Dino has been transformed! He feels stronger and he has turned into a Shadow Dino!

it.name: Manurek
it.desc: The Manurek is a very strange type of earth used by the Dinos' ancestors.
it.effect: Your offering to the Clan has been accepted by the Totem.

it.name: Ketcha Feathers
it.desc: The Ketcha is a poisonous snake covered in feathers, which are a great trophy.
it.effect: Your offering to the Clan has been accepted by the Totem.

it.name: Ancestral Tooth
it.desc: The Ancestral Tooth is a shiny little stone which gets its name from its dark colour and its strong smell of Blackberry Liqueur.
it.effect: Your offering to the Clan has been accepted by the Totem.

it.name: Unicorn's Mane
it.desc: Unicorns are such rare animals that no Dino has ever seen one. However, from time to time a Unicorn's mane is found. It is recognisable by its slight silvery sheen.
it.effect: Your offering to the Clan has been accepted by the Totem.

it.name: Magic Wood
it.desc: This is very rare and much sought after. When burnt, it produces fireworks specially favourable to the invocation to the Totem.
it.effect: Your offering to the Clan has been accepted by the Totem.

it.name: Dinobeach Gold Medal
it.desc: You have won this medal for bravery shown in the Dinobeach Tournament!

it.name: Dinobeach Silver Medal
it.desc: You have won this medal thanks to your efforts in the Dinobeach Tournament.

it.name: Dinobeach Bronze Medal
it.desc: It's a good start. All the great Dino started off once with this medal.

it.name: Mount Dino Gold Medal
it.desc: At the end of the dangerous Mount Dino Tournament you achieved this gold medal!

it.name: Mount Dino Silver Medal
it.desc: This reward comes from the fearful Mount Dino Tournament.

it.name: Mount Dino Bronze Medal
it.desc: Proof of your bravery on Mount Dino, this medal can open up some paths for you...

it.name: Zen Tournament Gold Medal
it.desc: This medal grants you the rank of Zen Master, bravo!

it.name: Zen Tournament Silver Medal
it.desc: This medal grants you the rank of Zen Novice, brilliant!

it.name: Zen Tournament Bronze Medal
it.desc: This medal grants you the rank of Zen Apprentice, fantastic!

it.name: Mayincas Gold Medal
it.desc: The Mayincas were destroyed because of that strange thing called ''gold'': If you wear this medal, at least think of your distant ancestors.

it.name: Mayincas Silver Medal
it.desc: This medal rewards Dino that have triumphed in a hostile jungle.

it.name: Mayincas Bronze Medal
it.desc: After tough combat, you have obtained this super medal!

it.name: Dinotown Gold Medal
it.desc: You've obtained the last reward in Dinoland. Every Dino has dreamed at some stage of having his own between his hooves. Congratulations, you now are part of the Dinoland annals of history!

it.name: Dinotown Silver Medal
it.desc: The silver medal gives you the strength to reach the last reward: the gold!

it.name: Dinotown Bronze Medal
it.desc: This bronze medal is worth gold, since only the strongest Dino have won it.

it.name: Fossilized Cheese
it.desc: It is said that this ancient piece of cheese was part of the first shipment of cheese produced in Dinoland. The sales were so disastrous that the production of cheese was immediately abandoned in favour of Dinodonuts (to the great delight of the younger dinoz). That's the reason why it's a collector's item. Unique in its kind.

it.name: Aphrodisiac Pendent
it.desc: An ancient inscription on the pendent makes us assume that it's a jewel which is several centuries old!

it.name: Wooden Cocoffer
it.desc: The Cocoffer is a chest measuring less than one centimetre by one centimetre. At the present time, its contents are a mystery. Its small size impedes any attempt to open the lock since it could break into a thousand pieces. We only know that it makes a ''chic chic'' sound when it is shaken.

it.name: Snail's Claw
it.desc: Normally snails don't have claws. But the Goliath snail, called ''the slaverer'', who lives in the North of Dinoland, has some very pretty claws on its shell. Occasionally, it loses one when it rubs itself against a tree or when it tries to move a rock. These claws, mainly for their rarity, are therefore, a much appreciated collector's item.

it.name: 4 Leafed Clover
it.desc: It's only one of the clovers that grow in the meadows of Dinoland. A very common species, nothing compared to the 12 leafed carnivorous clover.

it.name: 1 Gold Dineuro
it.desc: This coin belongs to the old Dinoland currency: the dineuro. After the Great Crisis of 39, the Commerce Commission of the Council of the Wise proposed substituting the dineuro by the present Gold coin, which is the sole new currency of the Dinopean Community.

it.name: 1 Silver Dineuro
it.desc: This extremely rare coin belongs to the old currency of Dinoland: the dineuro. After the Great Crisis of 39, the Commerce Commission of the Council of the Wise proposed substituting the dineuro by the present Silver Coin, which is the sole new currency of the Dinopean Community.

it.name: The Mordor Flame
it.desc: This is a legendary flame which, so they say, can keep away the forces of evil thanks to its powerful magic. It's also useful for lighting a bonfire.

it.name: Peanuts
it.desc: Delicious Dinoland peanuts, ripe, juicy and tasting of grape. If allergic, keep away.

it.name: Green Gem
it.desc: A mysterious green gem, with the letter K inscribed on one of its sides. It's strange, but if it gets lost or disappears, it comes back on its own the next day.

it.name: Lead Glove
it.desc: This is a collection item formerly used by the Dinolean. Ball players the glove was used to liberate all the force of the thrower. This method, really efficient, was prohibited by the Sports Committee after the accidental destruction of a mountain during a particularly violent game.

it.name: Pacific
it.desc: The Pacific is the symbol of peace in Dinoland. It's a carnivorous plant several metres high which wanders through the woods. It can swallow up to 5 times its weight in meat, afterwards digesting it for days.

it.name: Volcanic Pearl
it.desc: Volcanic pearls have been used for a long time in adornment as well as in jewellery. Until one day, when someone realized that they were the cause of the numerous volcanic eruptions on the island. It only takes one small blow to liberate the volcano they contain. That would explain the presence of the numerous mountains that are characteristic of the island.

it.name: Slaver Dust
it.desc: The process of production of this powder is still a mystery, which makes it a rare and expensive component. Although not necessarily in much demand.

it.name: The Treasure Map
it.desc: It's an old map of the treasure found in a pirates tavern. Next to the title, in careful hand writing, is the hiding-place of the legendary treasure of Captain Hatchet, nicknamed ''the Pitiless''. He is renowned, not only for his cruelty, but also for his intelligence, which explains why he forgot to mark the hiding-place with a cross on the map.

it.name: Sweet Petal
it.desc: It's a dried petal from the chocoplant. It has the peculiarity of curling up when it dries. It's a crunchy sweet which is often eaten with milk.

it.name: Socrates Tooth
it.desc: They say that this tooth belonged to Socrates, a Moueffe, slightly bothered by a premonition. It seems that, in his day, he took advantage of this particular skill to do well in battle...

it.name: Hamburger
it.desc: The classic hamburger used to be one of the most exquisite delicacies of the Dino. It was quickly replaced by the novelty Cloudburger, more tender, tastier and lighter. This object is a real collector's item.

it.name: The Mysterious Eye
it.desc: There isn't a lot of information about the Mysterious Eye (nobody has made it speak yet). The only thing that is known is that it is alive and it moves by rolling around.

it.name: The Golden Hook
it.desc: It's a golden hook which was found on a dock. A merchant, who had come from far-off islands, used to sell them a long time ago. He must have lost it.

it.name: Laba Ball
it.desc: When you shake it, the Laba ball makes a clink, clink sound! It's a most highly esteemed collector's item, but, in fact, it's quite useless. It's one of the 5 elements of the treasure of Jazz island!

it.name: Depth Ball
it.desc: Strange things float in the interior of the Depth Ball. They say that sometimes you can nearly see inside it a Dino, of an unknown, yet superior race. It's one of the 5 elements of the treasure of Jazz island!

it.name: Snow Ball
it.desc: The Snow Ball is very much in demand for its hypnotic powers, but it's a poisonous item. Damned be he who dares to stare at this ball, because its magic will send him into a deep and dark sleep. for your safety, remove the batteries. It's one of the 5 elements of the treasure of Jazz island!

it.name: Sea Ball
it.desc: It's the biggest of the 5 balls. It is almost 150cm in diametre and it weighs several hundred kilos. You really have to want it if you ant to keep it. It's one of the 5 elements of the Jazz island treasure!

it.name: Spider Ball
it.desc: The Spider ball is covered in a slimey substance, which drips all the time. Everything that comes near gets stuck for a long time. The advantage is that you can use it as a pendent without needing a chain. It's one of the 5 elements of the treasure of Jazz island!

it.name: Fimacling Spider's Web
it.desc: It's a solidified spiders web. The Fimacling are tiny spiders who live in the undergrowth of the swamp. The web is so fine that it hardly lasts for more than a few minutes, and the mists of the swamp solidify it. The collectors would buy it for *astronomical* prices! But, obviously, you don't want to sell it :)

it.name: Mini-Toby
it.desc: In the past, it was undoubtedly something delicious and tasty. But now, it's just a rotten toadstool, slimey and stinking. Actually, it isn't a collectors' item, but there's no way you can get rid of it, because it's stuck to your fingers.

it.name: Manurex with moss
it.desc: This manurex is of no interest to the totem because the passing of time has covered it with moss. It's an excepcionally rare item.

it.name: The Administrator's Ring
it.desc: It is said that the ring bearer will get supreme powers! He will be capable of instantly striking his opponent with a bolt of lightening and he will obtain thousands of coins with a simple movement of his ring finger! This would seem to be the key to enter the legendary ''Administrator's space''. The Ring Bearer will be like God! It's a pity that the instructions are in Korean.

it.name: Pocket Lightening Conductor
it.desc: It should have been a good idea: a portable lightening conductor for protection in case of necessity. Unfortunately, the inventor didn't realize that having a lightening conductor in your hands was not such a good idea... Keep it well (just in case). There's only one.

it.name: Pressure cooker Valve
it.desc: This item is a complete mystery. Nobody has the remotest idea as to how this item was able to get to Jazz island. It smells of steak and kidney pie and cauliflower. It has an inscription, like the trade mark: «Free Tibet!»

it.name: Baby Cloud
it.desc: This baby cloud has been following you everywhere since you found it. It doesn't speak much, but when it gets angry, it gets above you and rains and shoots bolts of lightening at you.

it.name: Virgin Spell
it.desc: For unknown reasons, this spell has never been broken since it was first used. The element which it contained has been used up, but the talisman hasn't evaporated. It's so rare that it's great to boast about.

it.name: Dissecated Piopi
it.desc: This small solidified creature is, it would appear, a Piopi. You don't know how it got here because the Piopi race belongs to a paralell world (www.pioupiouz.com). Anyway, it's very decorative.

it.name: A Real Peruvian Hat
it.desc: This Peruvian hat is a present from Cerbeck, the pony. You are asking why it insisted so much on giving you this gift... by the way, the culprit of the theft of the medals is still a mystery... So many mysteries! Someone has written ''Free Tibet'' on the inside of the hat.

it.name: The Sword of the Conquerors
it.desc: For your Excellence in the Great War of the Clans, we present you with this powerful and unique blade together with our most sincere congratulations. It's a sign of your great domination over the other clans! We hope that your bravery will serve as an example to future generations of Dino Masters

it.name: War Rune
it.desc: This distinction bears witness to your exemplary participation in the Great War of the Clans, in which you were outstanding for having reached the highest classification.

it.name: Tana Katana
it.desc: For your excellence in the battlefield of the War of the Clans, you receive this unique weapon together with our most sincere congratulations. It's a sign of your great domination over the other clans! We hope that your valour will be an example to future generations of Dino Masters.
NOT USED

it.name: Magic Sword
it.desc: For your warrior qualities shown in the *War of the Clans*, we wish to honour you with this unique weapon together with our most sincere congratulations. It's a symbol of absolute domination over the other clans! We hope that your bravery will serve a an example to future generations of Dino Masters.

it.name: Totem Tears
it.desc: This illustrious distintion bears witness to your exemplary participation in the *War of the Clans*, in which you reached the highest point of the classification.

it.name: Jazz Ball
it.desc: This prestigious reward shows the whole world that you have discovered the Five Magic Balls and that therefore you have solved the mystery of Jazz island. Congratulations!

it.name: The Triple-force Metal Balls
it.desc: For your excellence in the *War of the Clans*, we present you with this legendary weapon as a sign of your fierce domination over the other clans. This weapon was forged by the council of Softys a long, long ago during the time of the Great Microwave-Burn-All crater.

it.name: Totem Eye
it.desc: This distintion bears witness to your exemplary participation in the *War of the Clans*, and in this clasification, you obtained an illustrious and leading position.

it.name: 5th Sense Rune
it.desc: Congratulations for your participation to the epic *3rd Clans War*, hoping that you will renew your exploit for the 4th!

it.name: PomPom Hammer
it.desc: Great Warrior of the *3rd Clans War*! You are rewarded for your bravery by a numbered exemplary of the PomPom Hammer. Keep it away from children under 8 years old.

it.name: Médaille Clignotante
it.desc: Cette médaille récompense les valeureux Guerriers de la *6ème Guerre des Clans*. Pour votre courage dans cette guerre, l'équipe de Dinoparc vous offre une médaille clignotante. Il paraît en effet que tous les 1000 ans, elle change de couleur. Pas de risque d'épilepsie donc...

it.name: Kabuki Prize
it.desc: This prize rewards you for finishing the *Kabukis Quest*! Now you'll be able to find Kabukis in the Dino shop.

it.name: Magic Shuriken
it.desc: Your Clan have been noticed during the 4th Clans War, this *Magic Shuriken* rewards your strategist talents. Thanks to your shoe size 16, you had let no chances to your enemies, trampling them without mercy.

it.name: Magic Duck
it.desc: For your noticed participation to the 4th Clans War, you receive this *Magic Duck* that, people says, brings luck in case of drowning. Do not forget it before making your Dinoz swim!

it.name: Viscera-Turner
it.desc: To honour your victory during the Superb 5th Clans War, this *Viscera-Turner* in stainless steel has been offered to you. To test in priority on all your enemies, including your little sister who creates multi-accounts.

it.name: Bomb-Pendant
it.desc: For your participation more than honourable to the Superb 5th Clans War, The Dinoparc Team congratulates you by offering this *Bomb-Pendant*, very practical to defend yourself where you are unexpectedly attacked!

it.name: Coal Globe
it.desc: This *Coal Globe* rewards you for your courage in the *Hermite Arena*. Good luck!

it.name: Bronze Globe
it.desc: This *Bronze Globe* rewards you for your exploits in the *Hermite Arena*. Good luck for what happens next!

it.name: Silver Globe
it.desc: This *Silver Globe* is reserved to the greatest Warriors of the *Hermite Arena*! Congratulations for your exploits!

it.name: Gold Globe
it.desc: The *Gold Globe* is the elite item of the *Hermite Arena* ! The Dinoparc team congratulates you for your tenacity!

it.name: Gods Book
it.desc: To honour your victory during the *Gods War* (6th War), this *Gods Book* will tell your exploits during many generations.

it.name: Dinosopher's Stone
it.desc: For your noticed participation to the *Gods War* (6th War), the Dinoparc team congratulates your by offering this *Dinosopher's Stone*, which apparently transforms the Pruniac in Gold Coins! (even if nobody has ever made it work)

it.name: Alliance Treaty
it.desc: Congratulations! Your victory in the *7th Clan War* has been rewarded by this Alliance Treaty, that certifies your dual talents of Warrior and Diplomat.

it.name: The Laughting Cowed-Axe
it.desc: For your noticed participation to the *7th Clan War*, the Dinoparc team congratulates you by offering this *Laughing Cowed-Axe*: made from 100% natural products, a small axe blow every day is apparently very good for the health.

it.name: Twin Blades of Mr Per Nicious
it.desc: Congratulations! Your victory in the *8th Clan War* has been rewarded by these Twin Blades, which certify your dual talents of Warrior and Diplomat. Forged by Mr Per Nicious, famous master in the negociation, trickery and cunning art. People says that he would have usually offered one of this blades as proof of trust before stabbing its twin in an ancient ally's back.

it.name: Broken Pact
it.desc: For your noticed participation to the *8th Clan War*, the Dinoparc team congratulates you by offering this *Broken Pact*: symbol of your political schemes in the battle for the clans ranking in the Dinoparc world.

it.name: Cosmik Sword
it.desc: Congratulations! Your victory in the *9th Clan War* has been rewarded by this Cosmik Sword. People say that the eye in its center sees and knows all ... too bad that it can't speak....

it.name: Monstroplankton
it.desc: For your participation in the *9th Clan War*, the Dinoparc team has awarded you this *Monstroplankton* amulet: if freed, it is possible that this animal-plant would devastate the universe. Fortunately, this pendant is pretty tough... according to the manual at least...

it.name: Gene-and-Tick
it.desc: This item given by the professor Alphagen enables you to access to a new Dinoz via the Shop

it.name: Tohn Hammer
it.desc: For your excellence in the *10th Clan War*, we give this Hammer to you which was owned by the legendary warrior Tohn! It is said that the bearer can use it to provoque earthquakes and cataclysms ... that is if one day you are able to lift it.

it.name: Living Soda
it.desc: This distinction testifies your notable participation to the *10th Clan War*, in which you have been ranked amongst the most powerful Clans of Dinoland.

it.name: Sound Forger
it.desc: In recognition of your exploits in the *11th Clan War*, you have earned a hammer which seems to allow you to fabricate false market bonds, fortunately it's in safe hands.

it.name: Beer of Brothers
it.desc: This Beer of Brothers has been given to you in recognition of your achievnments in the *11th Clan War*. It symbolizes the friendship and brotherhood of all the Dinoz Masters in Dinoland, regardless of Clan allegiances. This won't stop the next war, but as they say, it's the thought taht counts!

it.name: Goblin Skull
it.desc: For your excellence in the *12th Clan War*, you have earned this magnificent Goblin Skull, as a souvenir of the massacres you had to carry out to get to the top!

it.name: Goblin Chains
it.desc: In recognition of your exploits in the *12th Clan War* you have been given these Goblin Chains, ideal for keeping your enemies captive!

it.name: Baboom
it.desc: In recognition of an amazing performance in the *13th Clan War*, you have been awarded a Baboom: it won't explode, but it'll certainly frighten your enemies!

it.name: Blue Rune
it.desc: In recognition of your exploits in the *13th Clan War* you have been awarded this Blue Rune, famed for its ability to render the wearer immune from Type d1n6 Flu!

it.name: Heavenly Helmet
it.desc: In recognition of an amazing performance in the *14th Clan War*, you have been awarded a Heavenly Helmet, a unique object which allows you to hear the movement of the sea...

it.name: War Helmet
it.desc: In recognition of your exploits in the *14th Clan War* you have been awarded this War Helmet, which is only given to warriors who are not wet behind the ears, probably due to the built-in dehumidifier!

it.name: Precious Ring
it.desc: A golden ring, topped with 3 rubies, ''one ring to tame them all'' according to the tiny script engraved on the inside. Only the champions of the 15th Clan War have earned the right to wear it!

it.name: Tarnished Ring
it.desc: A pale blue ring, given to clan members in recognition of their exploits during the 15th Clan war... A legend tells of certain warriors feeling ill upon removing it.

it.name: Dorogon Canine
it.desc: A Dorogon canine tooth is offered to the winners of the 16th Clan War. You show it off with pride. Just be sure taht the Dorogon that lost it isn't in the area!

it.name: Dorogon Molar
it.desc: A Dorogon molar is awarded to the clans who showed extreme valour in the 16th Clan War. It weighs almost 3kg so not very easy to transport, however, it could be used as a luxury paperweight.

it.name: Golden Armour
it.desc: Well this is pretty much what is says on the tin, and was awarded to the winners of the *17th Clan War*. Those who wear it are never worried about being targeted: which is fortunate because it shines so brightly, you're the only thing anyone can see on the battlefield.

it.name: Glove of Righteous Fury
it.desc: In recognition of your exploits in the *17th Clan War* you have been awarded The Glove of Righteous Fury. Equipped with this glove, nobody will dare stand against you, that said, that's pretty normal, whosoever wears this magical artefact can't stop punching those around them in the throat.

it.name: Shining Samurai
it.desc: You have been awarded a samurai helmet for winning the *18th Clan War*! The former owner was a powerful shogun who won many battles, in no small part due to the fear caused by this helmet. Unfortunately it now shines too brightly to be used in battle.

it.name: Phantom Samurai
it.desc: The helmet of the phantom samurai is said to contain the souls of warriers struck down on the battlefield. This serves as proof of your exploits in the *18th Clan War*. However, it's only purpose now is decoration. In fact, it's now impossible to wear the helmet without hearing the screams of the ghosts residing within...

it.name: Mage Sword
it.desc: An extremely powerful magic sword has been awarded to you for winning the *19th Clan War*! It's just a shame it's shattered and now only measures three centimetres...

it.name: Mage Stone
it.desc: You have been awarded the Mage Stone in recognition of your performance in the *19th Clan War*. It contains an extremely powerful magic, it's a shame we no longer know how to forge it.

it.name: Djinn Statue
it.desc: This statue of Djinn has been awarded to you for winning the *20th Clan War*. It brings happiness, luck, and most of all, dust.

it.name: Yggdra Statue
it.desc: You have been awarded the Statue of Yggdra in recognition of your performance in the *20th Clan War*. It seems to emanate warmth, hope, and splinters.

it.name: Citadel of Vertigo
it.desc: The Citadel of Vertigo has been awarded to you for winning the *21st Clan War*. From it's balconies, you'd be forgiven for thinking you can see the entire world. Don't look down though - unless you want a fright!

it.name: Jade Palace
it.desc: You have been a stay in the Jade Palace in recognition of your performance in the *21st Clan War*. You have to use your arm strength to climb all the way to the top, the lift repair man still hasn't shown up!

it.name: Ancien guerrier
it.desc: Cette figurine d'un ancien guerrier maintenant à la retraite vous est offerte pour avoir remporté la 26ème Guerre des clans .

it.name: Artiste martial
it.desc: Cette figurine d'un pratiquant des arts martiaux vous est offerte pour vos exploits lors de la 26ème Guerre des clans.

it.name: Coupe d'Or
it.desc: Cette coupe récompense vos victoires lors de la 27ème Guerre de Clans : un véritable objet de Champion !

it.name: Coupe d'Argent
it.desc: Cette coupe récompense votre performance lors de la 27ème Guerre de Clans : c'est la marque d'un grand exploit !

it.name: Coupe d'Or rare
it.desc: Cette coupe récompense vos victoires lors de la 28ème Guerre de Clans : c'est une grande distinction reservée aux meilleurs joueurs !

it.name: Coupe de Bronze
it.desc: Cette coupe récompense votre performance lors de la 28ème Guerre de Clans : celà n'est déjà pas facile à obtenir !
